implementationmode.label: Implementation mode
implementationmode.helperText: Choose the type of work the agent should perform.

options.label: Feature / Fix
options.description: Implement new functionality or fix a bug.
options.instruction: Implement the requested feature or fix the described issue.

options.label: Refactor
options.description: Improve structure or readability without changing behavior.
options.instruction: Refactor for clarity, maintainability, and performance without altering behavior.

options.label: Code review
options.description: Perform a code review and highlight defects/risks.
options.instruction: Review code for defects, risks, regressions, and missing tests; be specific and concise.

scope.label: Scope
scope.helperText: How broad the work should be.

options.label: Minimal change
options.description: Smallest change that solves the issue.
options.instruction: Prefer the smallest targeted change that solves the problem; avoid broad refactors.

options.label: Targeted with cleanup
options.description: Fix the issue and nearby code health.
options.instruction: Fix the issue and do light cleanup nearby; keep changes scoped to affected areas.

options.label: Broader improvement
options.instruction: If it clearly improves maintainability or correctness, make the broader change and explain why.

options.label: No tests
options.instruction: Avoid adding tests; justify clearly and note follow-up.

options.label: Add/Update tests
options.description: Add or update tests where impacted.
options.instruction: Add or update tests to cover the change; prefer minimal, focused cases.

options.label: Enhance coverage
options.instruction: Improve coverage where it increases confidence; remove dead/duplicated cases.

options.label: Offline-safe
options.description: Do not rely on network; prefer local data.
options.instruction: Keep behavior offline-safe; avoid new external calls; prefer local assets/config.

options.label: Local only
options.instruction: Use only local services/files; no new external endpoints; document local assumptions.

options.label: External allowed
options.instruction: External calls are allowed if necessary; be explicit about endpoints and failure modes.

options.label: Minimal
options.instruction: Keep docs minimal; only add comments where intent is non-obvious.

options.label: Update existing docs
options.description: Update existing docs affected by the change.
options.instruction: Update existing docs or READMEs touched by the change; no new sections unless needed.

options.label: Add brief docs
options.instruction: Add concise docs/notes if it clarifies behavior or usage; avoid long narratives.

options.label: API
options.instruction: Review APIs/contracts; keep backward compatibility unless explicitly allowed; document changes.

options.label: UI/UX
options.instruction: Respect existing UX patterns; avoid regressions; keep typography/theme consistent.

options.label: Performance
options.instruction: Consider performance; avoid obvious regressions; note any trade-offs.

options.label: Security
options.instruction: Flag security/privacy concerns; avoid unsafe defaults; minimize data exposure.
